description: Enable real-time web search and data extraction capabilities.

tavilyApiKey.description: The API key for the Tavily MCP server.

tools.name: tavily-search
tools.description: A powerful web search tool that provides comprehensive, real-time results using Tavily's AI search engine. Returns relevant web content with customizable parameters for result count, content type, and domain filtering. Ideal for gathering current information, news, and detailed web content analysis.

days.description: The number of days back from the current date to include in the search results. This specifies the time frame of data to be retrieved. Please note that this feature is only available when using the 'news' search topic

topic.description: The category of the search. This will determine which of our agents will be used for the search

country.description: Boost search results from a specific country. This will prioritize content from the selected country in the search results. Available only if topic is general. Country names MUST be written in lowercase, plain English, with spaces and no underscores.

end_date.description: Will return all results before the specified end date. Required to be written in the format YYYY-MM-DD

start_date.description: Will return all results after the specified start date. Required to be written in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

time_range.description: The time range back from the current date to include in the search results. This feature is available for both 'general' and 'news' search topics

max_results.description: The maximum number of search results to return

search_depth.description: The depth of the search. It can be 'basic' or 'advanced'

include_images.description: Include a list of query-related images in the response

exclude_domains.description: List of domains to specifically exclude, if the user asks to exclude a domain set this to the domain of the site

include_domains.description: A list of domains to specifically include in the search results, if the user asks to search on specific sites set this to the domain of the site

include_favicon.description: Whether to include the favicon URL for each result

include_raw_content.description: Include the cleaned and parsed HTML content of each search result

include_image_descriptions.description: Include a list of query-related images and their descriptions in the response

tools.name: tavily-extract
tools.description: A powerful web content extraction tool that retrieves and processes raw content from specified URLs, ideal for data collection, content analysis, and research tasks.

urls.description: List of URLs to extract content from

format.description: The format of the extracted web page content. markdown returns content in markdown format. text returns plain text and may increase latency.

extract_depth.description: Depth of extraction - 'basic' or 'advanced', if usrls are linkedin use 'advanced' or if explicitly told to use advanced

include_images.description: Include a list of images extracted from the urls in the response

include_favicon.description: Whether to include the favicon URL for each result

tools.name: tavily-crawl
tools.description: A powerful web crawler that initiates a structured web crawl starting from a specified base URL. The crawler expands from that point like a graph, following internal links across pages. You can control how deep and wide it goes, and guide it to focus on specific sections of the site.

url.description: The root URL to begin the crawl

limit.description: Total number of links the crawler will process before stopping

format.description: The format of the extracted web page content. markdown returns content in markdown format. text returns plain text and may increase latency.

max_depth.description: Max depth of the crawl. Defines how far from the base URL the crawler can explore.

max_breadth.description: Max number of links to follow per level of the tree (i.e., per page)

instructions.description: Natural language instructions for the crawler. Instructions specify which types of pages the crawler should return.

select_paths.description: Regex patterns to select only URLs with specific path patterns (e.g., /docs/.*, /api/v1.*)

extract_depth.description: Advanced extraction retrieves more data, including tables and embedded content, with higher success but may increase latency

allow_external.description: Whether to return external links in the final response

select_domains.description: Regex patterns to restrict crawling to specific domains or subdomains (e.g., ^docs\.example\.com$)

include_favicon.description: Whether to include the favicon URL for each result

tools.name: tavily-map
tools.description: A powerful web mapping tool that creates a structured map of website URLs, allowing you to discover and analyze site structure, content organization, and navigation paths. Perfect for site audits, content discovery, and understanding website architecture.

url.description: The root URL to begin the mapping

limit.description: Total number of links the crawler will process before stopping

max_depth.description: Max depth of the mapping. Defines how far from the base URL the crawler can explore

max_breadth.description: Max number of links to follow per level of the tree (i.e., per page)

instructions.description: Natural language instructions for the crawler

select_paths.description: Regex patterns to select only URLs with specific path patterns (e.g., /docs/.*, /api/v1.*)

allow_external.description: Whether to return external links in the final response

select_domains.description: Regex patterns to restrict crawling to specific domains or subdomains (e.g., ^docs\.example\.com$)
